pkgmetadata.longdescription: python-recaptcha2-----------------A minimalist Python client for the Google reCAPTCHA 2.0 API.Usage:: >>> import recaptcha2 >>> recaptcha2.verify(SECRET_KEY, INVALID_RESPONSE, REMOTE_IP) {u'error-codes': [u'invalid-input-response'], u'success': False} >>> recaptcha2.verify(SECRET_KEY, VALID_RESPONSE, REMOTE_IP) {u'success': True}
